price: A. L̃.R. Littãfi ne mun saukar da shi zuwa gare ka dõmin ka fitar da mutãne daga duhunhuna zuwa ga haske, da iznin Ubangijinsu, zuwa ga tafarkin Mabuwãyi, Abin gõdẽwa.
arabic: الٓرۚ كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَيۡكَ لِتُخۡرِجَ ٱلنَّاسَ مِنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra kitābun anzalnāhu ilayka litukh'rija al-nāsa mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri bi-idh'ni rabbihim ilā ṣirāṭi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
translations: so that you may bring out
